resources.string:
"MARATHA VYAVSAYIK UDYOJAK" Business Application is 
 Specialized for MARATHA Communityn to grow 
 Enterprenior Relationship

* Grow your Business through maximum Customer Viewers
 
 * Easy finding your Business details

* This app valid for "MARATHA" Community Business 
 Enterpriners
 
 * Registration of Business Enterprenuer Required Cast 
 Certificate/Birth Certificate/ Leaving Certificate
 
 * Registration cost of Business Enterpreners is Rs 200 
 per year
 
 * Transfer your Registration amount to following Account 
 Details
